personal.name: Nikunj Arora

personal.bio: I'm an 8th grade student with a passion for coding, mathematics, and science. I love building things with technology and exploring how the digital world works. Welcome to my portfolio where I share my projects and journey in learning!

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive web app that displays current weather and forecasts using a public API.

projects.title: Math Quiz Challenge
projects.description: An interactive quiz game with different difficulty levels and score tracking.

projects.title: Learning Journal Blog
projects.description: A simple blog where I document my coding journey and share what I learn.

projects.title: Line Follower Robot
projects.description: Built with my robotics club - a robot that follows black lines using sensors and Arduino.

achievements.title: Science Fair Finalist
achievements.description: Selected as a finalist in our school's science fair for my project on renewable energy sources.

achievements.title: Python Fundamentals Certificate
achievements.description: Completed an online Python programming course covering basics, data structures, and simple projects.

achievements.title: Math Olympiad - School Level
achievements.description: Earned distinction in the school-level Mathematics Olympiad competition.

achievements.title: Robotics Club Member
achievements.description: Active member of school robotics club, participating in competitions and building projects.

interests.title: Coding & Programming
interests.description: Learning different programming languages and building web applications and games.

interests.title: Robotics & Electronics
interests.description: Building robots and exploring how electronic components work together.

interests.title: Chess
interests.description: Strategic thinking and problem-solving through the classic game of chess.

interests.title: Football
interests.description: Passionate about football - playing with friends and staying active through the beautiful game.
